arts.ttl: Preview: Racing Club de Ferrol vs. Rayo Vallecano - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Copa del Rey clash between Racing Club de Ferrol and Rayo Vallecano, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: America and their new BOMBSHELL signing! Marcelo, James Rodriguez or Falcao are the names that sound
arts.sum: Three international elite names are strongly heard in the corridors of the Nido de Coapa: Marcelo, James Rodriguez and Radamel Falcao . After winning the Liga MX championship, rumors are making the Azulcremas dream, with Club America, always ambitious in the transfer market, which could be preparing a big surprise.
